oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Unimolecular 4-Hydroxypiperidines: New Ligands for Copper-Catalyzed N-Arylation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PATIL, PH
NALLASIVAM, JL
FERNANDES, RA
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: NITROGEN-CONTAINING HETEROCYCLES
CROSS-COUPLING REACTIONS
ARYL HALIDES
C-N
BOND FORMATION
IONIC LIQUIDS
HIGHLY EFFICIENT
ULLMANN REACTION
MILD CONDITIONS

copper
cross-coupling
N-aryl azoles
piperidines
Ullmann reaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A family of 4-hydroxypiperidines based mono, bis, tris, and tetrakis unimolecular compounds served as efficient ligands in combination with inexpensive CuI to catalyze Ullmann coupling reactions. A wide range of N-arylated indoles, benzimidazoles, imidazoles, pyrroles, and adenines were synthesized in moderate to excellent yields.
